summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Yacco EMR FHIR R4 API endpoints and role-based dashboards. Backend APIs are fully functional with 100% success rate including all FHIR interoperability endpoints. Frontend role-based dashboards are working correctly for Nurse, Scheduler, and Admin roles with all major features accessible and functional.

ui_bugs.issue: After login, users are redirected to /dashboard instead of role-specific dashboard
ui_bugs.workaround: Users can navigate to their role-specific dashboard via sidebar navigation. All dashboards are accessible and functional.

passed_tests: User registration and login for all roles (nurse, scheduler, admin)
Nurse dashboard loads at /nurse-station with MAR and vitals sections
Scheduler dashboard loads at /scheduling with patient registration and appointment scheduling
Admin dashboard loads at /admin with user management and system health
Role-based navigation shows correct items for each role
Admin can create new users via user creation dialog
Scheduler can register patients via patient registration dialog
FHIR R4 API endpoints information displayed in admin dashboard
Frontend login and authentication for all user roles
